Cascadian Farm Organic Cinnamon Crunch Cereal, Whole Grain Cereal, 9.2 oz

byCascadian Farm
Write a review
How does Amazon calculate star ratings?
Amazon calculates a product’s star ratings based on a machine learned model instead of a raw data average. The model takes into account factors including the age of a rating, whether the ratings are from verified purchasers, and factors that establish reviewer trustworthiness.

Top positive review

See all 69 positive reviews›
Amazon Customer
5.0 out of 5 starsBetter than Cin. Toast Crunch
Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020
I didn't expect to enjoy this better than cinnamon toast crunch, but I wholeheartedly do! Basically, I discovered that this type of cinnamon cereal just doesn't need to have that much sugar in order to be absolutely delicious. Now that I've had this kind, the other brand seems much too sweet and less filling. I would definitely buy this again although it is a little pricey so it won't be a staple in my house.
Read more

See all 22 critical reviews›
wstchr
1.0 out of 5 starsIt tastes like the packaging!
Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
I love Cascadian Farms Cinnamon Raison Granola, but I couldn't get any of it so I tried this Cinnamon Crunch.
Awful! It doesn't taste like they put any cinnamon in it at all. This box was stale and chemical tasting....the flavor of cardboard I assume.

Amazon Customer
5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Cin. Toast Crunch
Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020
Verified Purchase
I didn't expect to enjoy this better than cinnamon toast crunch, but I wholeheartedly do! Basically, I discovered that this type of cinnamon cereal just doesn't need to have that much sugar in order to be absolutely delicious. Now that I've had this kind, the other brand seems much too sweet and less filling. I would definitely buy this again although it is a little pricey so it won't be a staple in my house.
Helpful

Rivka Kawano
5.0 out of 5 stars Healthy breakfast treat
Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2014
Verified Purchase
We don't eat cereal a whole lot - in general I feel like there are better breakfast choices. However, when we do eat it, I want to make sure it is healthy, but also give the kids a treat. This is one that we all love. It is not nearly as sweet as the name brand alternative, but that is one of the reasons I like it. If your kids are used to eating really sugary cereals it may take time to adjust, but in a box or two they will love it. :-)

On Amazon is the best price I have found. Especially as I buy it through subscribe and save. Definitely cheaper than buying the same product at the grocery store.
5 people found this helpful
Helpful

Mom
5.0 out of 5 stars Organic, all natural, tastes just like Cinnmon Toast Crunch.
Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2015
Verified Purchase
Cinnamon Toast Crunch lovers, meet Cinnamon Crunch. It's basically the same cereal, but without the crap ingredients of the mainstream brand. Organic, all-natural, no BHA in the packaging. Yes you'll spend a bit more for this, but aren't you (and your kids, and the earth) worth it? I say yes.
9 people found this helpful

Amanda S.
5.0 out of 5 stars Taste great! Small box ....
Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
Verified Purchase
These taste great! The kids loved them! The down side is that the box is too small. I have three children so after a couple of days it was gone. I wish we could buy in a bigger, bulk sized package like you can do with several of the "all sugar" brands.

Retired Prof. of Literature, Alicia Josephs
4.0 out of 5 stars A bit to sweet, but nice tasting and good price for ORGANIC ...
Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2017
Verified Purchase
A bit to sweet, but nice tasting and good price for ORGANIC cereal. Cinnamon is good and very evident. Cinnamon controls blood sugar levels nicely, by the way. Research that fact and see. Keeps them from plugging, but wish this was a bit LESS sugary, less sweet, please. Cascadian Organics are good and nicely priced for organics.
One person found this helpful

Angie
5.0 out of 5 stars Great switch
Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2014
Verified Purchase
Who doesn't love Cinnamon Toast Crunch? This stuff is just as good, but I'm guessing slightly better for me? Hopefully! I like that they allow me to subscribe and save to it, as you need 5 items to qualify and most of them are large bulk items. Sometimes you just want a bowl of cinnamon toast crunch, you know? So why not get it and have it on hand all the time?! It's organic, so that counts for something to balance it out :) I have it with unsweetened almond milk and it's awesome.
4 people found this helpful

L. Farmer
5.0 out of 5 stars Cinnamon Crunch is Awesome!!
Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2015
Verified Purchase
I have been buying out our local Ingle's store's Cascadian Farm Cinnamon Crunch. It's new. It's delicious!!! My kids love it. I feel like it's slightly better than eating something from Kellogg's or GM or what have you. I really like making things home-made, but sorry...just not going to make my own cereal!! It's got quite a bit of sugar in it but unlike a lot of Cascadian Farm cereals, this one tastes really good.
